com.androidrecord
Class DateTime

java.lang.Object
  com.androidrecord.DateTime
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<DateTime>
public class DateTime
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<DateTime>

A wrapper for GregorianCalendar that provides a consistent interface for timestamps and string formatting.
